item.title: 马斯克的 X 选择 Polymarket 作为预测市场合作伙伴
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司和基于加密货币的预测市场平台 Polymarket 正在合作，向预测平台提供从社交媒体网站上的帖子中获得的数据驱动的见解和建议。【原文：Elon Musk’s X and the cryptocurrency-based predictions market platform Polymarket are partnering to provide data-drive insights and recommendations derived from posts on the social media site to the predictions platform.】

item.title: 特朗普签署命令，在世界杯前加强无人机安全
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五签署行政命令，加强美国的无人机能力，包括在2026年国际足联世界杯和2028年夏季奥运会等大型体育赛事在美国举办之前加强反无人机工具。【原文：President Donald Trump signed executive orders Friday to boost US drone capabilities, including strengthening counter-drone tools ahead of major sporting events such as the 2026 FIFA World Cup and the 2028 Summer Olympics that will be hosted in the country.】

item.title: 商务部为 430 亿美元宽带计划制定新规则
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）发布了新的指导意见，旨在重塑一项旨在用宽带服务连接全国的大规模互联网基础设施计划，命令各州重新制定最初的覆盖计划，以尽可能低的价格提供服务。【原文：US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick released new guidance aimed at reshaping a massive internet infrastructure program to connect the entire country with broadband service, ordering states to rework their initial coverage plans to deliver service at the lowest-possible price.】

item.title: 美联储任命迈克尔-霍洛维茨为新监察长
item.description: 美国中央银行任命迈克尔-霍洛维茨（Michael E. Horowitz）自 6 月 30 日起担任联邦储备委员会监察长办公室主任。【原文：The US central bank appointed Michael E. Horowitz to head the Federal Reserve Board’s Office of Inspector General starting June 30.】

item.title: 瑞士资本提出要求后，瑞银誓言坚守战略
item.description: 瑞士政府提出了严格的新规定，要求银行持有高达 260 亿美元的新资本，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）表示不会改变其战略。【原文：UBS Group AG said it won’t change it’s strategy after the Swiss government proposed strict new rules that could see the bank hold up to $26 billion in fresh capital.】

item.title: 特斯拉股价受困于马斯克与特朗普的决裂
item.description: 当唐纳德-特朗普总统在 11 月赢得大选时，投资者将特斯拉公司视为最大的赢家之一。在投资者眼睁睁地看着这个曾经强大的联盟实时解体之后，这个赌注现在似乎已经摇摇欲坠。【原文：When President Donald Trump won the election in November, investors viewed Tesla Inc. as one of the biggest winners. That bet now seems to be on shaky ground after investors watched the once formidable alliance dissolve in real time.】

item.title: 哈克敦促美联储在调整利率前等待更多明确信息
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长帕特里克-哈克（Patrick Harker）表示，今年下半年有可能降息，但他反复强调官员们目前应按兵不动，等待不确定性消退。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Patrick Harker said there’s a potential path to lowering rates in the second half of the year, but repeated officials should stand pat for now and wait for uncertainty to ebb.】

item.title: 根据埃利奥特的银点计划，泰晤士河水务公司需要 100 亿英镑的资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，包括银点资本（Silver Point Capital）和埃利奥特管理公司（Elliott Management）在内的基金正在为英国公用事业公司泰晤士水务（Thames Water）制定一项总额将超过 100 亿英镑（约合 135 亿美元）的拯救计划。【原文：Funds including Silver Point Capital and Elliott Management are working on a rescue plan for British utility Thames Water that would total more than £10 billion ($13.5 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 破产的金融科技公司 Synapse 要求清算而非重组
item.description: 破产金融科技公司 Synapse Financial Technologies Inc. 的受托人在该金融科技公司未能为其资产找到买家后，要求将其破产保护案件转为清算或完全驳回。【原文：A trustee for bankrupt financial-technology firm Synapse Financial Technologies Inc. has asked to convert its Chapter 11 case into liquidation, or dismiss the matter entirely, after the fintech failed to find a buyer for its assets.】

item.title: 太阳能马赛克计划申请破产，清洁能源困境加剧
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国最大的家庭太阳能贷款提供商之一 Solar Mosaic LLC 正计划申请破产，以应对联邦对清洁能源支持的市场不确定性。【原文：Solar Mosaic LLC, one of the largest US providers of home solar loans, is planning to file for bankruptcy in the face of market uncertainty over federal support of clean energy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: MLIV Pulse 调查显示：尽管美元持续下跌，股市仍将反弹
item.description: 彭博社（Bloomberg）对参加宏观趋势小组讨论的用户进行了一项调查，结果显示，美国股市将摆脱今年贸易战最严重的动荡局面，在 2025 年再创新高。【原文：US equities will put the worst of this year’s trade-war turmoil behind them and rally to fresh highs in 2025, according to a survey of Bloomberg subscribers who attended a panel discussion on macro trends.】

item.title: 卡尼将通过法案快速推进 "国家建设 "项目
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）周五宣布了一项立法，旨在快速推进加拿大的 "国家建设 "项目，并消除内部贸易壁垒，努力使加拿大经济免受美国关税大棒的影响。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney announced legislation on Friday to fast-track “nation-building” projects in Canada and remove internal barriers to trade in an effort to shore up the country’s economy from the US tariff barrage.】

item.title: 据说西班牙电信与马索兰格公司就沃达丰在西班牙的业务进行了早期谈判
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，西班牙电信公司（Telefonica SA）和马索兰格公司（Masorange）已就沃达丰（Vodafone）西班牙公司的潜在交易举行了非正式会谈，此举可能导致该国电信市场的进一步整合。【原文：Telefonica SA and Masorange have held informal talks on a potential deal for Vodafone Spain, people familiar with the matter said, a move that could lead to further consolidation in the country’s telecom market.】

item.description: 据熟知内情的美国和欧洲官员透露，唐纳德-特朗普总统正暂缓推动中国停止支持俄罗斯的战争机器，因为他正专注于与其最大地缘政治对手关系中的其他问题。【原文：President Donald Trump is holding back from pushing China to halt support for Russia’s war machine as he focuses on other issues in the relationship with its biggest geopolitical rival, according to US and European officials familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 以色列的美国经纪人在加沙战争期间为以色列出售创纪录的债务
item.description: 自与哈马斯开战以来，以色列通过其设在美国的经纪商以色列债券公司（Israel Bonds）筹集了创纪录的 50 亿美元资金，增强了其为持续 20 个月的冲突提供资金的能力。【原文：Israel has raised a record $5 billion through its US-based broker dealer, Israel Bonds, since the start of the war with Hamas, boosting its ability to finance the 20-month ongoing conflict.】
